talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_550%2Fh_550%2F829%2F334972%2F2023%2F10%2F27%2F626068.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 老師, 您知道'平行世界'理論嗎?

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 那是, 與我們所在的世界無限相似

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 但是世界, 或是老師您, 做出了不同的選擇

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 又或是發生了什麼概率學的奇蹟

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 哪怕是最微小的變量

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 都會導向一個完全不同的世界

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 比如說, 我也是'平行世界'的居民

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 我, 和他一樣, 都是'A.R.O.N.A.'

talkHistory.Name: 彩奈
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_252%2Fh_204%2F829%2F43637%2F2022%2F6%2F3%2F566384.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 彩奈
talkHistory.content: zzzzzZZZZZ

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 我想讓您記住的是

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: '平行世界'並不僅限存在

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 我代表的

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 和您所代表的

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 兩個實例而已

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 哪怕極其相似

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 卻又有著些許不同的世界

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 這樣的世界存在有無數個

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_550%2Fh_550%2F829%2F334972%2F2023%2F10%2F27%2F809006.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 而接下來我想要與老師分享的

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 就是那樣一個

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 和我們有著些許不同的世界

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_550%2Fh_550%2F829%2F334972%2F2023%2F10%2F27%2F69144.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 星奈
talkHistory.content: 這是

talkHistory.content: 某一個奇普托斯的故事

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E6%89%8D%E7%BE%BD%20%E7%BB%BF%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fmidori_spr-03_0_waifu2x_2x_2n_png.jpg&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 姐姐~ 還不投降嗎?

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_500%2Fh_500%2F829%2F43637%2F2023%2F2%2F2%2F381462.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 這時候投降了的話

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 那不就是半途而廢了嘛

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 而我 才羽桃井 永不放棄!

talkHistory.Name: systemInfo
talkHistory.content: 玩家cyber_green勝出!

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: https://BlueArcbox.github.io/resources/Stickers/13.webp

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 好啦, 小桃別哭啦

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 正好我也有點餓了, 要一起嗎?

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 好耶!

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 老師, 我想再去吃一次阿拜多斯的那個什麼拉麵!

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲記得哦! 桃井在說的應該是柴關拉麵吧?

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_500%2Fh_500%2F829%2F43637%2F2023%2F2%2F2%2F210160.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 老師, 我也可以一起去嗎?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 那就一起去吧?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 實際上今天...

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 夏萊附近的電車因為施工所以今天停運了

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 所以其實我是自己開車來的

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 小綠小桃愛麗絲, 還有柚子一起吧?

talkHistory.Name: 柚子
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_250%2Fh_250%2F829%2F191981%2F2024%2F7%2F5%2F951387.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_500%2Fh_500%2F829%2F43637%2F2023%2F2%2F2%2F440818.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 好耶!

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲加入了隊伍!

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 不過老師,

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 您開的車子, 我們一共五個人

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 倒不是我很介意, 只是想問問會不會很擁擠啊?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: Good... Great question小桃!

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 今天我沒開自己的那台車哦

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲明白了! 老師今天出門是因為桃井同學兩週前的約定

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 所以可以認為是夏萊的公務支出, 所以老師不必用自己的汽車, 這樣可以節省自己的財務開支!

talkHistory.Name: 柚子
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲, 那個還是不要說出來比較好哦

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 要是被計算器前輩聽到了, 難說老師自己會不會先被計算器前輩數落的唷~

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 欸? 優香前輩的名字什麼時候變得和冰心食人魔一樣連提都不能提到了嗎?

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 在走廊裡就聽到你們在叫我了

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 哇—— 是優香大... 前輩...

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 欸? 優香? 正好, 要不要一起去吃拉麵呀?

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E6%97%A9%E6%BF%91%20%E4%BC%98%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2FQQ%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20211127194631.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 欸? 老師怎麼也在?

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 等下... 老師說拉麵, 不會是阿拜多斯那家柴關拉麵吧?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 就是柴關拉麵

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 我和他們正在商量要不要一起去一趟阿拜多斯順便吃個飯

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 我今天開的是夏萊的那個白色麵包車

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 那輛車可是荷載32座的

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 就算再多幾個也都坐得下

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 欸? 可是老師真的有一次運輸那麼多人的駕駛執照嗎?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 區區地區道路交通法, 我可是法律以外的夏萊!

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E6%97%A9%E6%BF%91%20%E4%BC%98%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2FQQ%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20211127194705.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 再說了, 你們不是都有光環保護的嗎?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 哎呀一起來啦優香~

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 真是的, 老師. 算了, 果然還是太多變量了. 我還是跟著您吧.

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 好耶!

背景版: 柴關拉麵外
BGM: Mischievous Step (走格子)

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_267%2Fh_267%2F829%2F43637%2F2022%2F7%2F6%2F182642.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 老師~ 您也在啊!

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 欸? 是亞瑠?

talkHistory.Name: 無月
talkHistory.content: Hallo~ 老師下午好呀~

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: 如你所見, 老師, 我們剛完成了一單生意

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: 亞瑠賺了點錢, 然後就拉著我們來這裡了

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 欸?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 恭喜呀, 亞瑠醬~

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_267%2Fh_267%2F829%2F43637%2F2022%2F7%2F6%2F929211.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 作為便利屋68的社長, 有福同享當然不能忘!

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%AC%BC%E6%96%B9%20%E4%BD%B3%E4%BB%A3%E5%AD%90%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fkayoko_spr-07_0_waifu2x_2x_2n_png.jpg&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 無月
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E6%B5%85%E9%BB%84%20%E7%9D%A6%E6%9C%88%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2FQQ%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20211104205446.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 無月
talkHistory.content: Kufufu, 亞瑠醬還是這麼可愛呢~

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 喔對了, 介紹一下, 這是千年科技學院的遊戲開發部

talkHistory.Name: 柚子
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E8%8A%B1%E5%86%88%20%E6%9F%9A%E5%AD%90%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fyuzu_spr-08_0_waifu2x_2x_1n_png.jpg&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 亞瑠, 這是千年遊戲社的社長花岡柚子

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 柚子, 這是格黑娜便利屋68的社長陸八魔亞瑠

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 來, 一起握個手吧

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_400%2Fh_400%2F829%2F43637%2F2022%2F6%2F6%2F967285.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 你好呀~ 花岡同學!

talkHistory.Name: 柚子
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E8%8A%B1%E5%86%88%20%E6%9F%9A%E5%AD%90%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fyuzu_spr-03_0_waifu2x_2x_1n_png.jpg&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 柚子
talkHistory.content: 很高興認識你, 陸八魔社長.

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 那我們就一起進去吧?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 不瞞你們說, 為師餓了...

talkHistory.Name: systemInfo
talkHistory.content: 一行人進入了柴關拉麵內部

talkHistory.Name: 模擬參數
talkHistory.content:
背景版: 柴關拉麵
BGM: KIRISAME

talkHistory.Name: 大將
talkHistory.content: 呀, 是老師啊

talkHistory.Name: 一般市民
talkHistory.content: 茜香醬, 夏萊的老師來了唷

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 來了來了, 什麼事情?

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%BB%91%E8%A7%81%20%E8%8A%B9%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E6%89%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B6%E6%9C%8D%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fserika_shibaseki_spr_12.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 老師, 歡迎光臨!

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 這次人有點多喔, 茜香醬.

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 我帶了遊戲開發部過來唷, 外加優香,一共5個人

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 然後路上遇到了便利屋68他們四個

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 所以一共九人喔

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: (湊近了小聲對著茜香的耳朵) 抱歉啦茜香醬, 明天你來夏萊值日的時候我會好好補償的

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%BB%91%E8%A7%81%20%E8%8A%B9%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E6%89%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B6%E6%9C%8D%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fserika_shibaseki_spr_08.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 嘛, 我還以為什麼天大的事情呢

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 只是一次來了很多客人的話, 對我來說是家常便飯

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 不用放在心上的, 老師

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 不過... (小聲) 謝謝老師居然記得明天是我值日

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 我自己都快工作學習忙到忘記了

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: (同樣小聲) 唉... 阿拜多斯的問題這麼拖下去也不是個辦法...

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 茜香, 我今天是開車來的, 要不要今晚來夏萊住一晚? 省得你明天還要再跑一趟的.

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 你應該也知道, 夏萊其實有一層樓全部是旅店客房

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 我想, 會長留下這些恐怕也是處於這個考慮的吧?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 順便, 我想聽聽你對於阿拜多斯未來出路的真實想法

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 你們的債務, 環境, 招生等等問題

talkHistory.Name: 模擬參數
talkHistory.content:
背景版: 柴關拉麵
BGM: Unwelcome School

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%BB%91%E8%A7%81%20%E8%8A%B9%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E6%89%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B6%E6%9C%8D%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fserika_shibaseki_spr_07.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 誒? 欸欸欸? 老師你你你你你你要不要停下來聽一聽自己在說什麼呀啊啊...

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_241%2Fh_241%2F829%2F43637%2F2022%2F7%2F6%2F837125.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲見過這種情節!

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 小綠給我看過這種漫畫的喔

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E6%89%8D%E7%BE%BD%20%E7%BB%BF%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fmidori_spr-04_0_waifu2x_2x_2n_png.jpg&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲你快別說了我不是我沒有啊——

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 欸? 你們在說什麼有意思的話題?

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%BB%91%E8%A7%81%20%E8%8A%B9%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E6%89%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B6%E6%9C%8D%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fserika_shibaseki_spr_12.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: (小聲對老師) 不過, 如果是老師的話, 沒問題的唷

talkHistory.Name: 模擬參數
talkHistory.content:
背景版: 柴關拉麵
BGM: Lovely Picnic

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: (繼續小聲) 茜香醬最好啦!

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%BB%91%E8%A7%81%20%E8%8A%B9%E9%A6%99%2Fgallery%2F%E6%89%93%E5%B7%A5%E5%88%B6%E6%9C%8D%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fserika_shibaseki_spr_03.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 好啦好啦, 大家這裡請~

talkHistory.Name: 茜香
talkHistory.content: 各位要喝什麼嗎?

talkHistory.Name: 柚子
talkHistory.content: 冰水就好, 謝謝.

talkHistory.Name: 愛麗絲
talkHistory.content: 愛麗絲也是.

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 我的話, 果然還是咖啡吧.

talkHistory.Name: 桃井
talkHistory.content: 我要冰的山露汽水!

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 格黑娜方面呢?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 沒關係的, 最後肯定是為師請客

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 啊? 老師要買單嗎? 可是我們本來就是來開慶功宴的...

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: 社長啊, 我們是不是剛把上個月的水電網費湊齊? 剩下的不會就只剩一頓飯錢了吧?

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: 不行就我來結帳吧?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 啊? 還有這種事情, 亞瑠?

talkHistory.Name: 無月
talkHistory.content: Kufufu~ 亞瑠醬的小心思一眼就被老師知道了, 接下來會是什麼反應呢?

talkHistory.Name: 遙香
talkHistory.content: 亞瑠大人...

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 果然嗎, 亞瑠? 不然還是我來付錢吧?

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: https://wsrv.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fcdnimg-v2.gamekee.com%2Fwiki2.0%2Fimages%2Fw_267%2Fh_267%2F829%2F43637%2F2022%2F7%2F6%2F725477.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 那... 那就這樣吧, 老師. 謝謝您了.

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 聽起來這位同學似乎對於金融管理方面的技能有些缺失啊?

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 有沒有興趣讓我看看你們目前的運營情況?

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 欸? 優香? 沒問題嗎?

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 其實我在千年也經常聽說便利店68這個神秘的犯罪團夥

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 只是真的沒有想過, 傳說中那個無惡不作萬劫不復的社長...

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 居然會有資金週轉的問題

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 所以我現在很感興趣, 想要認真分析計算一下

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 當然這和我的職務沒有任何關係

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: 可以嗎, 老師?

talkHistory.Name: 綠
talkHistory.content: 哇, 是認真模式的優香前輩.

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%AC%BC%E6%96%B9%20%E4%BD%B3%E4%BB%A3%E5%AD%90%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2Fkayoko_spr-06_0_waifu2x_2x_2n_png.jpg&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 佳世子
talkHistory.content: 我沒意見

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%99%86%E5%85%AB%E9%AD%94%20%E9%98%BF%E9%9C%B2%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2FQQ%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20211115183244.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 無妨, 借助顧問老師的人脈, 適當地拓展我們的盟友網絡總是好的

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 早瀨優香同學, 便利屋68隨時歡迎您的到來

talkHistory.Name: 優香
talkHistory.content: '優香'就好, 陸八魔亞瑠同學, 不妨先交換下Momotalk吧?

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: https://img.vxs.nl/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstatic.kivo.fun%2Fimages%2Fstudents%2F%E9%99%86%E5%85%AB%E9%AD%94%20%E9%98%BF%E9%9C%B2%2Fgallery%2F%E5%88%9D%E5%A7%8B%E7%AB%8B%E7%BB%98%E5%B7%AE%E5%88%86%2FQQ%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE20211115183404.png&output=webp

talkHistory.Name: 亞瑠
talkHistory.content: 欸? 好的

talkHistory.Name: systemInfo
talkHistory.content: 於是在歡聲笑語中結束了一天, 把遊戲部的各位和優香送回家, 然後是格黑娜, 最後回到阿拜多斯接上茜香時已經是22時了

talkHistory.Name: systemInfo
talkHistory.content: 再回到夏萊早就過了午夜了, 洗完澡以後只穿著內衣躺在夏萊的沙發上便睡著了

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: 好像忘了點什麼? 算了太睏了明天再說了

talkHistory.Name: sensei
talkHistory.content: zzzzZZZ
